member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.CompressionLevel
member.summary: Represents the amount of compression to be applied when compressing data.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.CompressionMethod
member.summary: Represents the compression algorithm to be used when compressing data.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream
member.summary: Pass-through stream that applies compression and decompression to an inner stream.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.CompressionException
member.summary: Exception that is thrown when there is a problem compressing or decompressing data.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.CompressionInternalException
member.summary: Exception that is thrown when something unexpected occurs while compressing or decompressing data.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.Compressor
member.summary: Abstract class from which other classes can derive to implement custom compression algorithms.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.Decompressor
member.summary: An abstract class from which other classes can derive to implement custom decompression algorithms.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.Licenser
member.summary: Class which is used to register the classes located in the Xceed.Compression namespace.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.ManagedLZMACompressor
member.summary: Implements the LZMA compression algorithm.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.ManagedLZMADecompressor
member.summary: Implements the LZMA decompression algorithm.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.ManagedPPMdCompressor
member.summary: Implements the PPMd compression algorithm.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.ManagedPPMdDecompressor
member.summary: Implements the PPMd compression algorithm.

member.name: T:Xceed.Compression.QuickCompression
member.summary: Exposes static methods that allow basic byte array compression and decompression operations.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a CompressedStream using the default compressor and decompressor classes.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Compression.CompressionMethod,Xceed.Compression.CompressionLevel)
member.summary: Initializes a CompressedStream using the provided compression method and level.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Compression.Compressor)
member.summary: Initializes a compress-only CompressedStream using the provided compressor class.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Compression.Decompressor)
member.summary: Initializes a decompress-only CompressedStream using the provided decompressor class.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Compression.Compressor,Xceed.Compression.Decompressor)
member.summary: Initializes a CompressedStream using the provided compressor and decompressor classes.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Finalize
member.summary: Allows the CompressedStream object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Flush
member.summary: Causes all pending compressed data to be written to the inner stream, and updates the underlying data source or repository of the inner stream with the current state of the buffer.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.GetRemainingStream
member.summary: Retrieves a stream which starts immediately after the last byte of compressed data.
member.returns: A containing the data located immediately after the last byte of compressed data allowing you to continue reading the data.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads and decompresses a sequence of bytes from the inner stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the . This may be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes aren't currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached. Applications must check the return value to prevent data corruption.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: A CompressedStream object is not seekable.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: A CompressedStream object is not seekable.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.SetupPPMdCompression(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Compression.CompressionLevel)
member.summary: Prepares PPMd compression using the specified Stream and compression level.
member.returns: The ManagedPPMdCompressor that will perform the compression.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.SetupPPMdDecompression(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Prepares PPMd decompression using the specified Stream and compression level.
member.returns: The ManagedPPMdDecompressor that will perform the decompression.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.WillUseCompression(Xceed.Compression.CompressionMethod@,Xceed.Compression.CompressionLevel@)
member.summary: Determines whether a compression format will be used, based on a specified compression method and level.
member.returns: true if compression will be used; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses and writes a sequence of bytes to the inner stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes written to the inner stream. This may be less than the parameter. It may even be 0.

member.name: M:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Provides correct cleanup of resources in the base class and its derived classes.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.CanRead
member.summary: Determines whether the inner stream supports reading AND the compressed stream supports data decompression.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.CanSeek
member.summary: A CompressedStream object is not seekable.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Determines whether the inner stream supports writing AND the compressed stream supports data compression.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.InnerStream
member.summary: Gets the that was passed when creating this CompressedStream.

member.summary: A CompressedStream object is not seekable.

member.summary: A CompressedStream object is not seekable.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.RemainingOffset
member.summary: Gets the negative byte offset at which the compressed data ends inside the last data buffer read by the object.

member.name: P:Xceed.Compression.CompressedStream.Transient
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the stream is responsible for closing its inner stream.
